pyunity.examples.example1.scripts module¶

class pyunity.examples.example1.scripts.Rotator¶

Bases: pyunity.core.Behaviour

Update(dt)¶

Called every frame.

Parameters

dt (float) – Time since last frame, sent by the scene that the Behaviour is in.
